newsitem.title: USA: CBOT rice closes higher as stops hit late.
newsitem.headline: CBOT rice closes higher as stops hit late.

text.p: CBOT rice futures closed higher on late technical buying as buy stops were hit, but trading was quiet and volume was thin, traders said.
"There were stops late. There was a 15 cent rally almost into mid-air before selling showed up," a trader said.
Fundamentals were little changed with ongoing reports of excellent yields in early harvested U.S. rice areas limiting gains.
Rice closed four to five cents per cwt higher, with September up five at $10.12.
Rice futures volume was estimated at 300 contracts, down from 528 contracts Thursday. Rice options volume was estimated at 75, up from 35 contracts Thursday.
